title: The nuclear war of shutdowns: Trump targets federal jobs, grants
shortDescription: You call this governing? Some of the incentives for Trump and congressional Democrats are to fight, not compromise.

title: Trump warns of 'complete obliteration' if Hamas stays in power in Gaza
shortDescription: President Donald Trump warned of “complete obliteration” if the Palestinian militant group Hamas insisted on staying in power in Gaza.

title: Trump-appointed judge blocks National Guard deployment to Portland
shortDescription: The ruling is a setback for Trump who wants to send the military into cities against the wishes of their Democratic leaders.

title: Illinois gov says Trump admin. plans to federalize the National Guard
shortDescription: Trump had been saying since August that Chicago would be next in line after he deployed 800 National Guard troops in Washington DC.

title: Trump's commerce secretary pours gas on Jeffrey Epstein fire
shortDescription: Commerce Secretary Howard Lutnick told an interviewer he found Jeffrey Epstein, his next-door neighbor, "gross" when they first met in 2005.

title: The Treasury Department is considering a Trump $1 coin. Is that legal?
shortDescription: The Treasury Department announced the proposed $1 coins bearing Trump’s image as part of a campaign to commemorate America’s 250th birthday.

title: Government shutdown will continue as Senate votes fail
shortDescription: The government remains closed for the weekend. Two Democrats and an independent voted to end the shutdown, but the 54-44 vote left Republicans short.

title: Hamas agrees to part of Trump’s Gaza plan
shortDescription: Hamas said it will release Israeli hostages under President Donald Trump’s Gaza plan but refuses to disarm before Israel ends occupation.

title: Supreme Court lets Trump strip deportation protections for Venezuelan migrants
shortDescription: The Trump administration wants to end a program that allows some Venezuelans to live and work temporarily in the United States.

title: Trump tells Israel to stop bombing Gaza so hostages can be released
shortDescription: Hamas agreed to release all Israeli hostages under the terms of Trump's plan and signaled readiness to enter negotiations to end the war in Gaza.

title: Trump and Epstein statue returns to DC
shortDescription: A statue of President Donald Trump holding hands with sex offender Jeffrey Epstein returned to National Mall a week after it was removed by NPS.
